mockCategories=[{id:"electronica",name:"Electrónica",count:156},{id:"ropa",name:"Ropa y Accesorios",count:234},{id:"hogar",name:"Hogar y Jardín",count:89},{id:"deportes",name:"Deportes",count:167},{id:"libros",name:"Libros",count:78}];const delay=ms=>new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,ms));export const mockAPI={async getProducts(){await delay(800);return mockProducts;},async getProductById(id){await delay(600);return mockProducts.find(product=>product.id===parseInt(id));},async getProductsByCategory(categoryId){await delay(700);return mockProducts.filter(product=>product.category===categoryId);},async getCategories(){await delay(500);return mockCategories;},async searchProducts(query){await delay(600);return mockProducts.filter(product=>product.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||product.description.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));}};
